meanings.definition: Bubbles formed on the surface of a liquid by agitation or fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The soapy suds floated on top of the water.
meanings.sent2: I love seeing suds when I wash my hands with soap.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to catch the suds as they popped.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like suds in a washing machine.
meanings.sent5: The suds sparkled like tiny diamonds in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: When I scrubbed the floor, it started to suds up.
meanings.sent2: The detergent suds quickly when mixed with water.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they watched the soap suds grow.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement sudsed up inside her like a fizzy drink.
meanings.sent5: The river sudsed as the waterfall crashed into it.
